events.message: I have just filed a claim regarding the recent car accident that occurred on Main Street last weekend involving my vehicle. The impact caused significant damage to the front bumper and engine hood.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident cases, as it primarily involves collision damage to the insured car caused by another vehicle.
An agent has been assigned to your auto accident claim to manage the further investigation and assist you through the process step-by-step.
Your claim has been acknowledged by our claims department. We appreciate your prompt reporting and will begin processing it immediately.
Please provide the accident police report, repair estimate, and photos of the damaged vehicle parts to move forward with your auto accident claim.
All requested documents, including the police report and vehicle repair estimate, have been submitted successfully for your auto claim.
The investigation into your car collision claim has started. Our specialists will review all details to confirm the cause and extent of damages.
The investigation into your accident claim has been completed, confirming the liability and damage amount within expected parameters.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the assessment report and will cover the repair costs and a rental car reimbursement.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the smooth and timely handling of your auto accident claim settlement offer.
Your auto accident claim has been officially approved, and all terms of the settlement have been agreed upon, pending final payment.
Payment for the approved claim has been issued today and should arrive within the next three business days to your registered bank account.
Your auto accident claim has been officially closed. We hope your experience was satisfactory and your vehicle has been restored adequately.
